text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-group-membership-basis-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 2 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/group-membership-basis5.0.0  definitionalDefinitionalThe Group.characteristics specified are both necessary and sufficient to determine membership. All entities that meet the criteria are considered to be members of the group, whether referenced by the group or not. If members are present, they are individuals that happen to be known as meeting the Group.characteristics. The list cannot be presumed to be complete.
http://hl7.org/fhir/group-membership-basis5.0.0  enumeratedEnumeratedThe Group.characteristics are necessary but not sufficient to determine membership. Membership is determined by being listed as one of the Group.member.

name: R5GroupMembershipBasisForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.GroupMembershipBasis for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/group-membership-basis|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/group-membership-basis|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Group.membership`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/group-membership-basis|5.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
